attacks.name: Wild SWing
attacks.special: If more Failures than Successes are rolled, the Trophy Hunter is Prone after the Attack has been made.

traits.name: Trophy Frenzy
traits.description: Collecting trophies from their defeated foes riles these Gremlins into even more of a frenzy. For each Character the Trophy Taker Knocks Out, their total AP is increased by 1. Their total AP is reduced back to 2 if they ever become Prone.
